plot: The secret of Jason's evil is revealed. It is up to the last remaining descendant of the Voorhees family to stop Jason before he becomes immortal and unstoppable. This is the final (?) battle to end Jason's reign of terror forever.

m.role: Papa Wolf: Steven. The very second he finds out he is a father, and that not only is Jessica in danger of Jason their daughter is, he gets crazy and holds his own against the newly resurrected Jason. The following dialogue says it best.

f.role: Mama Bear: Joey B., exemplified in a scene where she refuses to hand Stephanie back to Jessica because she's with Steven, who at that point was suspected of murdering Jessica's mother. It's also implied that she let Vicki keep Stephanie at the diner to protect her in case Steven showed up once she heard he was on the run.

name: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday
